rows.label: qev013102_MSG0001
rows.name:
Who are you? Why are you here?
I want to be left alone![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013102_MSG0002
rows.name:
If you've got no business here, get going.
And if you do, make it quick.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013102_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev013102_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask about the Celeste Three.

rows.label: qev013102_JNK0020
rows.name: Press

rows.label: qev013102_SEL0021
rows.name:
Tell him Fosdyke sent you and
demand to know Briggs's location.

rows.label: qev013102_MSG0003
rows.name: I have nothing to say to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013102_MSG0004
rows.name:
Fosdyke? The name is vaguely familiar,
but I have no recollection of the man.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013102_MSG0005
rows.name:
Gave you that, did he? Well, I'll be.
Seems the man sees something worthwhile in you...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013102_MSG0006
rows.name:
I assume he told you I'm not the trusting type.
Well, I'm also not stupid enough to put my life
in some stranger's hands.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013102_MSG0007
rows.name: I need you to pass a test before this goes any further.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013102_MSG0008
rows.name:
Go kill five sea forfexes. If you can't handle at least
that much, Briggs will eat you alive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013102_MSG0009
rows.name:
Why are you still here? Go and kill those
five sea forfexes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013102_MSG0010
rows.name:
I'm not trusting you until then, and I'm certainly not
doing a damn thing for a [ST:gender p1=man p2=woman ] I don't trust![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013102_MSG0011
rows.name:
You took those sea forfexes down? Hmm...
You might actually stand a chance against him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013102_MSG0012
rows.name:
All right, I'll talk. I take it Fosdyke informed
you of the particulars?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013102_JNK0030
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev013102_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Moorehouse that you know everything.

rows.label: qev013102_JNK0040
rows.name: Evade

rows.label: qev013102_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Moorehouse for his side of the story.

rows.label: qev013102_MSG0013
rows.name: Good. Spares me the effort.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013102_MSG0014
rows.name: Briggs is holed up in the bowels of Molten Hollow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013102_MSG0015
rows.name:
A monster named Briggs stole a load of white gold and
hid it away, killing many innocents in the process.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013102_MSG0016
rows.name:
And out of fear for our own lives, myself and
a man named Fosdyke helped him do it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013102_MSG0017
rows.name:
The only thing I got out of it was a lifetime's worth of
nightmares, and I want to see Briggs hang for that.
Clear enough for you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013102_MSG0018
rows.name: Good. He's holed up in the bowels of Molten Hollow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013102_MSG0019
rows.name:
Bet you're wondering why anyone would pick a place
like that to live, eh? Well, he's got a giant safe there.
Built the thing himself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013102_MSG0020
rows.name:
He's not letting anyone near that white gold.
Greedy bastard will do anything it takes to
keep his prize.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013102_MSG0021
rows.name:
He ruined my life. And Fosdyke's.
Still better than what the others got...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013102_MSG0022
rows.name:
Please, he's got to be stopped. You make that
happen, and I'll atone for my part in this horror
story any way you like.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013102_MSG0023
rows.name:
That Briggs is crooked as an old fence.
Don't go thinking you'll be able to play fair with him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013102_MSG0024
rows.name:
You feed him whatever lies you have to,
but don't trust a damn word he says.[ST:wait ]
